channel.title: Max level and maximum xp?
channel.description: does anyone know the maximum xp and/or the maximum level, im experimenting to try and find the maximum xp and level i could have, i've found that 2b is too high, 999m is too high, and 200m xp only works for lvl 126, if anyone has any info would be appreciated :) :P
